ComicInfo.Summary:
TREMBLE BEFORE THE VICTORIOUS QUEEN SONJA OF HYRKANIA! â€¦for now. Yea, she outwitted Dragan The Magnificent, but it is a fleeting triumph. Spies and vipers surround, awaiting the perfect time to strike. A tale of tact, trust and trepidation, by MARK RUSSELL (The Flintstones, The Wonder Twins) and MIRKO COLAK (Conan).
